import { NavLink, useLocation } from "react-router-dom"; const Menu = () => { const location = useLocation(); // Open Categories menu for all category routes const isCategoryOpen = location.pathname === "/categories/expenses" || location.pathname === "/categories/income"; return (
{/* Brand Logo */} My money {/* Sidebar */}
    {/* Dashboard */}
  • `nav-link ${isActive ? "active" : ""}` } >

    Dashboard
    • {/* Categories (Parent ONLY UI) */}
  • {/* Parent is NOT a NavLink */}

    Categories

    {/* Sub Menus */}
    • `nav-link ${isActive ? "active" : ""}` } >

      Expense Categories
    • `nav-link ${isActive ? "active" : ""}` } >

      Income Categories
); }; export default Menu;
